closeDebt(ITetuConverter,address,IUniswa.details: Closes the debt positions for the given token pair.

getDebtTotalCollateralAmountOut(ITetuCon.details: Returns the total collateral amount out for the given token pair.

returns.totalCollateralAmountOut: The total collateral amount out for the token pair.

getDebtTotalDebtAmountOut(ITetuConverter.details: Returns the total debt amount out for the given token pair.

returns.totalDebtAmountOut: The total debt amount out for the token pair.

needCloseDebt(uint256,ITetuConverter,add.details: we close debt only if it is more than $0.1

rebalanceDebt(ITetuConverter,address,Uni.details: Rebalances the debt by either filling up or closing and reopening debt positions. Sets new tick range.

BORROW_PERIOD_ESTIMATION.details: should be placed local, probably will be adjusted later
